item.title: New Robert Pattinson Sci-Fi Movie Could Lose Up To $80 Million, Revealed In Box Office Report
item.description: The new science fiction movie starring The Batman's Robert Pattinson is projected to lose up to $80 million by the end of its theatrical run.

item.title: “I Would Be Shocked If It Doesn’t Happen”: Invincible Creator Robert Kirkman Shares Update On The Live-Action Movie 8 Years After Initial Announcement
item.description: Robert Kirkman, creator of the original Invincible comics, speaks out on the progress of the live-action movie eight years after its announcement.

item.title: 15 Best Movies Like Den Of Thieves 1 & 2
item.description: Den of Thieves 2 is finally here, marking the perfect occasion to check out some other great movies that likely inspired the Gerard Butl action saga.

item.title: Rollin' 60s Crips' Big U Turns Himself In, Denies Committing Crimes
